goal_descEN: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
target_descEN: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
indicator_descEN: Conflict-related deaths per 100,000 population, by sex, age and cause
seriesDescription: Conflict-related death rate (civilians), by sex, age and cause of death (%)
age_desc: All age ranges or no breaks by age
footnotes: This figure includes only documented and verified civilian deaths caused directly by war operations for the armed conflicts in Afghanistan, Central African Republic, Democratic Republic of Congo, Iraq, Libya, Mali, State of Palestine and Israel, Somalia, South Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, and Yemen. This figure may vary from other UN civilian casualty figures due to the methodology used that build on UN casualty data while integrating new data sources.
sources: The figures include only direct conflict-related deaths of civilians recorded by the United Nations. Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR)
